mapper.select:
select b.*, a.name, a.co_url, c.prj_ttl, a.mem_id, case when noti_knd = 'task' then ( select tsk_prgs from task where noti_id = b.noti_id) when noti_knd = 'schedule' then ( select TO_CHAR(sche_bgn_dt||','||sche_end_dt) from schedule where noti_id = b.noti_id ) when noti_knd = 'todo' then ( select TO_CHAR(RATIO_TO_TODO(b.noti_id)) from dual ) end addlist from member a, board b, project c where b.prj_id = c.prj_id and a.mem_id = b.mem_id and b.noti_knd <> 'subtask' and a.mem_id = ${memId}
and noti_ttl like '%' || #{notiTtl} || '%'

SELECT prj_id, prj_ttl FROM project where prj_knd = 'C' and co_url = #{coUrl} union SELECT a.prj_id, a.prj_ttl FROM project a, prj_parti b where a.prj_knd = 'N'
and a.prj_id = b.prj_id and b.mem_id = #{memId} and a.co_url = #{coUrl} union SELECT c.prj_id, c.prj_ttl FROM project c, prj_parti d where c.prj_knd = 'N' and c.prj_open_perm = 'all' and c.prj_id = d.prj_id and c.co_url = #{coUrl}

select e.*, s.noti_id2, g.noti_dttm, m.name from task e LEFT OUTER JOIN subtask s on e.noti_id = s.noti_id2 inner join board g on e.noti_id = g.noti_id inner join member m on e.mem_id = m.mem_id where g.prj_id = #{prjId}
and noti_ttl like '%' || #{notiTtl} || '%'

select a.*,b.*,c.prj_ttl, d.name, d.co_url, case when noti_knd = 'task' then ( select tsk_prgs from task where noti_id = b.noti_id) when noti_knd = 'schedule' then ( select TO_CHAR(sche_bgn_dt||','||sche_end_dt) from schedule where noti_id = b.noti_id ) when noti_knd = 'todo' then ( select TO_CHAR(RATIO_TO_TODO(b.noti_id)) from dual ) end addlist from board a, bookmark b, project c, member d where a.noti_id = b.noti_id and a.prj_id = c.prj_id and a.mem_id = d.mem_id and c.co_url = d.co_url and b.mem_id = #{memId}
and noti_ttl like '%' || #{notiTtl} || '%'

select a.* , b.co_url, b.prj_id, b.prj_ttl, c.noti_open_perm, c.noti_dttm, d.name from text a, project b, board c, member d where a.noti_id = c.noti_id and b.prj_id = c.prj_id and b.co_url = d.co_url and c.mem_id = d.mem_id and c.noti_id = #{notiId}

select a.*,b.noti_ttl as subtskTtl, b.subtsk_prgs, b.subtsk_end_dt, b.mem_id, c.noti_open_perm, c.noti_dttm, d.prj_id, d.prj_ttl, e.name from task a LEFT OUTER JOIN subtask b on a.noti_id = b.noti_id2 inner join board c on a.noti_id = c.noti_id inner join project d on c.prj_id = d.prj_id inner join member e on c.mem_id = e.mem_id where a.noti_id = #{notiId}
select a.*, b.name, c.subtsk_cntn, p.prj_ttl from board a, member b, subtask c, project p where a.mem_id = b.mem_id and a.noti_id = c.noti_id and a.prj_id = p.prj_id and a.noti_id = #{notiId}

select a.* , b.co_url, b.prj_id, b.prj_ttl, c.noti_open_perm, d.name, c.noti_dttm from schedule a, project b, board c, member d where a.noti_id = c.noti_id and b.prj_id = c.prj_id and b.co_url = d.co_url and c.mem_id = d.mem_id and c.noti_id = #{notiId}

select a.* , b.co_url, b.prj_id, b.prj_ttl, c.noti_open_perm, c.noti_dttm, d.name from todo a, project b, board c, member d where a.noti_id = c.noti_id and b.prj_id = c.prj_id and b.co_url = d.co_url and c.mem_id = d.mem_id and c.noti_id = #{notiId}
